entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023
